caption.title: Chromosomal features of Akebia trifoliata subsp. australis.
caption.p: Hi-C map of the A. trifoliata subsp. australis genome showing genome-wide all-by-all interactions ( A) and characterization of the A. trifoliata subsp. australis genome ( B). a repeat density; b gene density; c chromosomes; d GC content; and e relationship between synteny blocks
